title: Please Bully Me, Miss Villainess!
description: Yifang found herself transported into the body of a villainess in an otome game. As the villainess, her role is supposed to be despised by the readers, bully the FMC, and help the main characters find romance. But there seems to be something wrong with this game's main character Aisha!aka: Qing Qifu Wo Ba, Eyi Xiaojie!, 请欺负我吧，恶役小姐！
author: CHI SE
